Sands Shoppes Macao provides more ways to shop exclusive luxury
World-class retail destination, Sands Shoppes is now offering shoppers the chance to reserve exclusive luxury items ahead of their visit to Macao. The launch of Sands Shoppes Click to Reserve, an unprecedented online platform, provides access to an exclusive selection of must-have products from the world’s most desirable luxury brands, including Tiffany & Co, Versace, Bally, Jimmy Choo, MCM, KWANPEN, Furla, Roberto Cavalli, Just Cavalli, Armani Junior, Bang & Olufsen and Burg. What’s more, all items are only available in Macao at Sands Shoppes.
The key benefits that Click to Reserve offers are speed, convenience and most importantly, an extensive list of beautiful, luxury products that can be reserved with a simple click. Once reserved exclusive items are available for collection within 48 hours allowing shoppers to relax and enjoy their visit to Sands Resorts. As an integrated resort city, Sands Resorts Cotai Strip Macao provides every guest an unforgettable world-class luxury shopping experience in Macao through Sands Shoppes, which is renowned for its stunning architecture, luxurious amenities, inviting atmosphere and, not least, the largest duty-free selection with over 650 retailers from the world’s most coveted designer fashion and lifestyle brands.
Click to Reserve offers an extensive range of seasonal products from these brands, including exquisite jewellery, fashion IT bags, shoes and even accessories, for both ladies and gentlemen. The current centrepiece of Click to Reserve is the Tiffany’s Jazz Age Collection, which is exclusive to Hong Kong & Macao.
“Click to Reserve is another great Sands Retail innovation aimed at providing the best possible shopping experience for our customers. We understand the frustration when coveted fashion accessories are not available. Not only are we bringing many sought after exclusive items to Macao, Click to Reserve provides online access in advance, so our customers won’t be disappointed”, said David Sylvester, Executive Vice President, Global Retail, Las Vegas Sands Corp.
